name: AllTheJars
description: AllTheJars is your ultimate hub for Minecraft downloads, offering direct access to every official and modded Minecraft jar. Designed for both server owners and players, AllTheJars ensures authenticity, reliability, and convenience by providing files directly from their original sources, we never host files ourselves.

name: Luca Hosting Template
description: LucaHostingTemplate is a clean and game focused starting point for building a hosting provider website. It's designed to be simple, responsive, and SEO-optimized, so you can quickly launch a professional hosting site.

name: ChitShtools
description: ChitShTools is your go-to hub for a diverse collection of practical tools and scripts designed to simplify everyday tasks. Frustrated by the need to search for and utilize multiple websites for various utilities, I created ChitShTools to provide a comprehensive solution.

name: GuildGuard
description: GuildSense employs advanced sentiment analysis to monitor and evaluate user messages in real time. By assigning sentiment scores to message content, it facilitates automated moderation actions, ensuring a positive and respectful community.
